"Equip Accessories":
"Accessory editing has been moved to \"Main Menu\" → \"Fashion/Catalog\" → \"Fashion Editing\".

Please note that accessories you select here will be reset to their default position, so be careful when choosing. In addition, note that the only accessory visible in [PSO2es] will be the one in \"Accessory Selection 1\", and only if it has an \"es\" icon displayed on it.

[Link to online manual]
